name: Document Submission
subject: Documents submission for {{JobTitle}} Application
body:
Dear {{CandidateName}},

Thank you for your interest in the {{JobTitle}} position at {{CompanyName}}. As part of the hiring process, we kindly request you to submit the necessary documents for verification.


Kindly share below mentioned documents.

  • Updated Resume
  • Passport size photo
  • Offer letters, hike letters, relieving letters of the companies
  • Recent 3 months payslips
  • Aadhaar, PAN
  • All mark sheets from SSLC to till highest degree semester wise
  • 2 years Form 16
  • Bank statement of a year
  • Two known referrals with contacts

Please upload all the above documents using the following link:

{{DocumentSubmissionLink}}

Kindly submit the documents before {{TomorrowDate}} to proceed with the next steps.
